title: Norwich vs Manchester United player ratings
text:
Manchester United eased to a 3-1 victory at Norwich despite Marcus Rashford and Anthony Martial’s penalty misses.

The Red Devils took the lead through Scott McTominay, but then blew the chance to double it when Rashford missed from the spot.

He would soon make amends, scoring two minutes later before Anthony Martial missed a second penalty for United before the break.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

The Frenchman, like Rashford, put the miss behind him though, making the game safe with 17 minutes to go before Onel Hernandez’s late consolation.

Here are the player ratings from Carrow Road.

description: Manchester United eased to a 3-1 victory at Norwich despite Marcus Rashford and Anthony Martial’s penalty misses. The Red Devils took the lead through Scott McTominay, but then blew the chance to double it when Rashford missed from the spot. He would soon make amends, scoring two minutes later before Anthony Martial missed a second penalty for United before the break.
